issue.title: [C++] Implement take kernel functions - string/binary value type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2103](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2103). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Should support string/binary value types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2103?focusedCommentId=16836254) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
`[~bkietz]` I think you already implemented string/binary as well in ARROW-2102 / https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3880 ?
